author: Doina Chiacu
title: New York's Cuomo challenges Trump's claim to have the authority to reopen economy
description: New York Governor Andrew Cuomo said on Tuesday that he would refuse any order by President Donald Trump that would begin the process of reopening the economy before it was safe to do so without reigniting the coronavirus outbreak in his state.
content: WASHINGTON (Reuters) - New York Governor Andrew Cuomo said on Tuesday that he would refuse any order by President Donald Trump that would begin the process of reopening the economy before it was safe to do so without reigniting the coronavirus outbreak in his… [+3528 chars]
